result.rule: Importing directly from "JS" module is not supported (arkts-interop-js2s-import-js)
Direct usage of interop JS functions is not supported (arkts-interop-js2s-js-expand-static-instance)
Classes cannot be used as objects (arkts-no-classes-as-obj)
Direct usage of interop JS functions is not supported (arkts-interop-js2s-js-expand-static-instance)
Classes cannot be used as objects (arkts-no-classes-as-obj)
"new" expression with dynamic constructor type is not supported (arkts-no-dynamic-ctor-call)
Properties of interop objects can't be accessed directly (arkts-interop-js2s-access-js-prop)
